WRITING.TEXT: I really don't know looking back on it, regret not keeping him sometimes, but I'm glad he found a good home though.
We actually had a really hard time letting him go, surprised we didn't keep him
He got adopted and is in a good home

WRITING.TITLE: Tried to get directions to my hotel that was 15 miles away, Google maps gave me this.
Rio, our former foster, loved to cuddle

WRITING.TEXT: I was trying to throw it from the sink behind my back into the trash can and it miraculously landed up there, horrible shot.

WRITING.TITLE: I threw this balled up paper towel on top of that wall on my first day of work 20 months ago, still there.
N" word dropped as soon as I opened the door....

WRITING.TEXT: Cool, I live about an hour south of DC
